name: Ray S. jone
comment: The best graphics cards are the lifeblood of any gaming PC — they're the beating heart pumping out stunningly-rendered pixels to your screen.

name: Ray S. Hopper
comment: Nvidia's GeForce RTX 3080 sports the new and improved Ampere architecture. It's over 30% faster than the previous gen 2080 Ti, and supposedly costs $500 less...

name: Anthony C. Jacobs
comment: For some, the best card is the fastest card — pricing be damned! Nvidia's GeForce RTX 3090 caters to this category of user....

name: Adam S. Arredondo
comment: Nvidia's Ampere march continues with what might just be the best of the bunch. The GeForce RTX 3060 Ti has all the same features as the other 30-series GPUs, with a starting price of just $399...

name: Joel D. Swearingen
comment: The GeForce RTX 3070 continues the Ampere onslaught and the march of next-gen architectures. It's a sizeable step down from the 3080, and has less than half the VRAM of AMD's RX 6800 series cards..

name: John B. Merlin
comment: Take everything great about the new Navi 21 GPU that powers the 6800 XT (above), then trim it by about 10% and you get the vanilla RX 6800.
